meetings.buildingName: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science

sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Information Sciences department.
sectionText: Focuses on geospatial data management and analytical methods using desktop and web GIS (Geographic Information Systems) software. The course will focus on methods and data related to community-based issues, local and national government, civil society, and participatory methods using GIS technologies. It is a hands-on course with weekly labs and service learning projects. [First offered Fall 2008] Meets with 490 GIU.Restricted to graduate students in the School of Information Sciences. All other students need instructor permission to register. Instructor James Whitacre (jvwhit@illinois.edu)
